column4: Can any of y'all recommend a good GUI tool (for X11) to aid in the comparison of changes between two large source trees?  Something like Beyond Compare did on Windows...
I guess something console-based could work too, though this strikes me as more of a job for a GUI app.
uh, yeah, diff only seems to handle a single pair of files at once.  I need to compare big trass of thousands of files each.
